VOICES OF ATLANTA: 2017 MAYORAL CANDIDATE FORUM
Thursday, September 21, 7 - 9 p.m.

RSVP with the Center for Civil and Human Rights

After a welcoming reception and meet and greet with the candidates, guests will participate in a round table discussion and hear how each candidate plans to address issues that impact your community.

When you register, you can also submit your questions for the candidates.

RSVP today to attend this exciting candidate forum for your next mayor of Atlanta!
